transport.question: I have wheels and go 'vroom vroom'! What am I?

hints.text: 🚗 I can be red, blue, or any color!
👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 Families ride in me.
🛣️ I go on roads.

transport.question: I float on the water, and I might have a sail. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I like to be on the sea.
🪢 Sailors might use me.
👒 People ride me on vacation.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people to far away places. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I am bigger than a bird.
🌍 People go on holiday with me.
✈️ I have wings, but I am not a bird.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you pedal with your feet. What am I?

hints.text: 💺 You sit on a seat.
🤸 You use your legs to move.
🔔 I might have a bell to ring.

transport.question: I'm big and yellow, and I take kids to school. What am I?

hints.text: 🛑 I stop to pick up children.
🎒 I carry many students.
🚦 I have flashing lights.

transport.question: I travel on tracks, and I can carry lots of people or cargo. What am I?

hints.text: 🛤️ I only go on my special path.
🏭 I can deliver goods.
📣 I often have a loud whistle.

transport.question: I can fly straight up, and I have spinning blades on top. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I can hover in the air.
🏥 Sometimes I am used as an ambulance.
🌪️ My blades go 'whirly whirly'.

transport.question: I help put out fires. I am red and have a loud siren. What am I?

hints.text: 🚒 I have a big hose to spray water.
🚨 I hurry to rescue people.
🔥 I help stop things from burning.

transport.question: I zoom through space to visit the moon and stars. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I am super fast!
👩‍🚀 Astronauts use me.
🌌 I fly past the planets.

transport.question: I travel under the water and can explore the deep sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🔦 I can have a window to see through.
🐠 Fish swim all around me.
⚓ I'm used for deep sea explorations.

bug.question: I'm small and I crawl, and often found on a leaf. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I like to eat plants.
🐜 I am smaller than your hand.
🚶‍♀️ I have lots of tiny legs.

bug.question: I buzz around flowers and make yummy honey. Who am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am yellow and black.
🐝 I live in a hive.
🍯 I make something sweet.

bug.question: I have colorful wings and fly from flower to flower. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 My wings have pretty patterns.
🐛 I start as a caterpillar.
🌸 I like to drink nectar.

bug.question: I carry things bigger than me and live in a colony. Who am I?

hints.text: 💪 I am very strong.
🏠 I live underground with my family.
🍪 I like to eat crumbs you drop.

bug.question: I hop around in the grass and make a chirping sound. What am I?

hints.text: 🎵 I make music by rubbing my legs together.
🟢 I am usually green.
🦵 I have very long legs for jumping.

bug.question: I glow in the dark at night. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I have a light inside me.
🌙 You can see me on warm summer nights.
🔦 I am a beetle.

bug.question: I have many legs and spin a sticky web. Who am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ My home is made of silk.
🕷️ I have eight legs.
🪰 I eat other bugs caught in my web.

bug.question: I have a hard shell and am red with black spots. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 I am considered lucky.
⚫ I have spots on my back.
🍎 I am often red or orange.

bug.question: I munch on leaves and can be many colors. I become a butterfly later on. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I love to eat leaves.
🦋 I change into something beautiful later.
🌈 You can find me in many colors, stripes, or spots.

bug.question: I make a high-pitched noise at night and like to bite. What am I?

hints.text: 🦟 I can be annoying when you are trying to sleep.
🩸 I like to drink blood.
〰️ My bite can make you itchy.
